feature.name: LABEL
feature.description: Author label or any other label you wish to include

feature.name: ENV
feature.description: Environment variables to be set in the container

feature.name: WORKDIR
feature.description: Sets the working directory inside the container

feature.name: COPY
feature.description: Copies files from the local directory into the container

feature.name: EXPOSE
feature.description: Exposes a port in the container

feature.name: VOLUME
feature.description: Defines a volume in the container

feature.name: RUN
feature.description: Runs commands during the image build

feature.name: ARG
feature.description: Defines arguments for the image build

feature.name: CMD
feature.description: Specifies the command to run when starting a container based on the image

feature.name: ENTRYPOINT
feature.description: Defines the entry point of the container
